channel.description: Recent content in marketplace on tecRacer Chef

item.title: Restrict AWS Marketplace offerings with private Marketplace
item.description: People are constantly stumbling over the AWS Marketplace and their more than 30,000 public offerings. Restricting such a massive amount of products is mainly done with the necessary internal AWS Marketplace policy that you find in a document in document management systems like AWS WorkDocs. What would you say about better restricting the public AWS Marketplace with a private Marketplace?
